name: SmartSketch 95 Document
summary: Learn about .SSK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SmartSketch was originally developed by FutureWave as a basic drawing program and was the predecessor of FutureSplash Animator. Macromedia bought FutureWave in 1996 and rebuilt FutureSplash Animator as Macromedia Flash, which is now Adobe Flash.
NOTE: SmartSketch 95 is a different program than Intergraph SmartSketch, a newer technical drawing program.

description: 2D drawing created with SmartSketch 95, an old vector graphics editing program for Windows; contains paths, shapes, and other vector-based data.
